body:
So, I've just hit my 2 year mark. I first joined Avicus just like 2 days before Mc Zone. The first gamemode I played was Walls (I have a walls fetish). I was banned for a year and finnaly got unbanned by Para (which I cant thank him enough) and have changed my act a bit and re-joined the community. So since it's been 2 years of Avicus why not have an AMA!

(I will answer all questions and any questions at all)

replies.body: How many children do you and Elsa have?
replies.body_tagged: How many children do you and Elsa have?

replies.body:
@Tazz, you're a pretty chill guy to hang out with. We don't talk a lot because of timezones but other then that you're pretty cool!

@DaFrozenSavage,

-Honestly, I don't know. It took me like 3 days of talking and debating to get unbanned so I guess. It was the mods vote anyways so if they think I should have I guess I deserved it.
-Nebula, walls has just gotten to plain for me
-Good, Competitive Nebula has made the game more interesting for me and makes me want to play more.
-Why not?
-Pretty chill guy, lags a lot, doesn't talk, and possibly the coolest lagger I've ever met :P


@Symbolism 

Uhh, during a skype call with Para and Eric.
